thread.title: Inter Defeated by Milan: Barella Shares the Recipe for Victory
thread.title_full: Inter Defeated by Milan: Barella Shares the Recipe for Victory

author: Zamin.uz
title: Inter Defeated by Milan: Barella Shares the Recipe for Victory
text:
Nicolo Barella, the midfielder of Inter Milan, gave an interview ahead of the UEFA Champions League match against Atletico Madrid. The match is scheduled to start at 11:00 PM Moscow time.
"As we studied the teams Milan and Atletico, we identified some similarities between them. Today, we need to play just as we did against Milan.
We showed a good performance in the derby, but we lacked precision and goals in front of the net. This time, we might have to opt for a less beautiful game, but we must be more precise in our efforts.
We want to play beautiful football, but the main objective is to score goals," Barella said in an interview with Prime Video. It is worth noting that Inter recently lost to Milan (0-1) in their previous encounter.
Inter Defeated by Milan: Barella Shares the Recipe for Victory
